unsorted.text: The ability to restrict functions based on values
Values with the same shape may be used interchangeably.
Sum types can describe different variants of a single type.
Union types that allow a value to be one of several distinct types.
A dynamic type system where types are checked at runtime.
A static type system that ensures type correctness at compile time.
The language has null or undefined values.
Errors are encoded at the type level.
The language has a small standard library of functions and utilities.
The language’s standard library can be “swapped out” for a different community maintained or custom one.
The language’s standard library covers many different areas such as UI, graphics,and more complex audio constructs.
Published packages must follow Semantic Versioning that ensures breakingchanges to an API are reflected by a major version bump.
